verses.verse: <S%H3130>It<s%> <S%H6651>happened<s%> at <S%H1250>the<s%> end of <S%H2344>two<s%> full <S%H3220>years,<s%> that <S%H3966>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H7235>dreamed:<s%> and <S%H2308>behold,<s%> he stood by the <S%H5608>river.<s%>

<S%H5927>Behold,<s%> there came up out of the <S%H2975>river<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6510>cattle,<s%> <S%H3303>sleek<s%> <S%H4758>and<s%> <S%H1277>fat,<s%> and they <S%H7462>fed<s%> in the marsh <S%H260>grass.<s%>

<S%H7651>Behold,<s%> seven <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H6510>cattle<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> after <S%H310>them<s%> out of the <S%H2975>river,<s%> <S%H7451>ugly<s%> <S%H4758>and<s%> <S%H1851>thin,<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H681>by<s%> the other <S%H6510>cattle<s%> on the <S%H8193>brink<s%> of the <S%H2975>river.<s%>

The <S%H7451>ugly<s%> <S%H4758>and<s%> <S%H1851>thin<s%> <S%H6510>cattle<s%> ate <S%H398>up<s%> the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3303>sleek<s%> <S%H4758>and<s%> <S%H1277>fat<s%> <S%H6510>cattle.<s%> So <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H3364>awoke.<s%>

He <S%H3462>slept<s%> and <S%H2492>dreamed<s%> a second <S%H8145>time:<s%> and <S%H7651>behold,<s%> seven heads of <S%H7641>grain<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> on <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7070>stalk,<s%> <S%H1277>healthy<s%> and <S%H2896>good.<s%>
<S%H7651>Behold,<s%> seven <S%H7641>heads<s%> of <S%H1851>grain,<s%> thin and <S%H7710>blasted<s%> with the east <S%H6921>wind,<s%> sprung <S%H6779>up<s%> after <S%H310>them.<s%>

The <S%H1851>thin<s%> <S%H7641>heads<s%> of grain <S%H1104>swallowed<s%> up the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H1277>healthy<s%> and <S%H4392>full<s%> <S%H7641>ears.<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H3364>awoke,<s%> and <S%H2472>behold,<s%> it was a dream.

It happened in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> that his <S%H7307>spirit<s%> was <S%H6470>troubled,<s%> and he <S%H7971>sent<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> for all of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>'s <S%H2748>magicians<s%> and wise <S%H2450>men.<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H5608>told<s%> them his <S%H2472>dreams,<s%> but there was no one who could <S%H6622>interpret<s%> them to <S%H6547>Pharaoh.<s%>
Then the <S%H8269>chief<s%> <S%H8248>cupbearer<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "I <S%H2142>remember<s%> my <S%H2399>faults<s%> <S%H3117>today.<s%>

<S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> was <S%H7107>angry<s%> with his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> me in <S%H4929>custody<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H8269>captain<s%> of the <S%H2876>guard,<s%> me and the <S%H8269>chief<s%> <S%H644>baker.<s%>

We <S%H2492>dreamed<s%> a <S%H2472>dream<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3915>night,<s%> I and <S%H2492>he.<s%> We dreamed each <S%H376>man<s%> according to the <S%H6623>interpretation<s%> of his <S%H2472>dream.<s%>

There was with us there a young <S%H5288>man,<s%> a <S%H5680>Hebrew,<s%> <S%H5650>servant<s%> to the <S%H8269>captain<s%> of the <S%H2876>guard,<s%> and we <S%H5608>told<s%> <S%H6622>him,<s%> and he interpreted to us our <S%H2472>dreams.<s%> To each <S%H376>man<s%> according to his <S%H2472>dream<s%> he <S%H6622>interpreted.<s%>
It <S%H6622>happened,<s%> as he interpreted to <S%H7725>us,<s%> so it was: he restored me to my <S%H3653>office,<s%> and he hanged <S%H8518>him.<s%>"

Then <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> and they brought him <S%H7323>hastily<s%> out of the <S%H953>dungeon.<s%> He <S%H1548>shaved<s%> <S%H2498>himself,<s%> changed his <S%H8071>clothing,<s%> and came <S%H935>in<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh.<s%>

<S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> "I have <S%H2492>dreamed<s%> a <S%H2472>dream,<s%> and there is no one who can <S%H6622>interpret<s%> <S%H8085>it.<s%> I have heard it <S%H559>said<s%> of <S%H8085>you,<s%> that when you hear a <S%H2472>dream<s%> you can interpret <S%H6622>it.<s%>"

<S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "It <S%H1107>isn't<s%> in me. <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H6030>give<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> an <S%H6030>answer<s%> of <S%H7965>peace.<s%>"
<S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> "In my <S%H2472>dream,<s%> <S%H5975>behold,<s%> I stood on the <S%H8193>brink<s%> of the <S%H2975>river:<s%>

and <S%H5927>behold,<s%> there came up out of the <S%H2975>river<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6510>cattle,<s%> <S%H1277>fat<s%> <S%H3303>and<s%> <S%H8389>sleek.<s%> They <S%H7462>fed<s%> in the marsh <S%H260>grass,<s%>

and <S%H7651>behold,<s%> seven <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H6510>cattle<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> after <S%H310>them,<s%> <S%H1803>poor<s%> and <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7451>ugly<s%> <S%H8389>and<s%> <S%H7534>thin,<s%> <S%H2007>such<s%> as I <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> in all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> for <S%H7455>ugliness.<s%>
The <S%H7534>thin<s%> and <S%H7451>ugly<s%> <S%H6510>cattle<s%> ate <S%H398>up<s%> the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H1277>fat<s%> <S%H6510>cattle,<s%>

and when they had eaten them <S%H935>up,<s%> it <S%H3045>couldn't<s%> be known that they had eaten <S%H935>them,<s%> but they were <S%H4758>still<s%> <S%H7451>ugly,<s%> as at the <S%H8462>beginning.<s%> So I <S%H3364>awoke.<s%>

I <S%H7200>saw<s%> in my <S%H2472>dream,<s%> and <S%H7651>behold,<s%> seven <S%H7641>heads<s%> of grain came <S%H5927>up<s%> on <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7070>stalk,<s%> <S%H4392>full<s%> and <S%H2896>good:<s%>

and <S%H7651>behold,<s%> seven <S%H7641>heads<s%> of <S%H6798>grain,<s%> withered, <S%H1851>thin,<s%> and <S%H7710>blasted<s%> with the east <S%H6921>wind,<s%> sprung <S%H6779>up<s%> after <S%H310>them.<s%>

The <S%H1851>thin<s%> <S%H7641>heads<s%> of grain <S%H1104>swallowed<s%> up the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H7641>heads<s%> of <S%H559>grain.<s%> I told it to the <S%H2748>magicians,<s%> but there was no one who could explain it to <S%H5046>me.<s%>"

<S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> "The <S%H2472>dream<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> is <S%H259>one.<s%> What <S%H430>God<s%> is about to <S%H6213>do<s%> he has <S%H5046>declared<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh.<s%>

The <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H6510>cattle<s%> are <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years;<s%> and the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H7641>heads<s%> of grain are <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%> The <S%H2472>dream<s%> is <S%H259>one.<s%>

The <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7534>thin<s%> and <S%H7451>ugly<s%> <S%H6510>cattle<s%> that came <S%H5927>up<s%> after <S%H310>them<s%> are <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> and also the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7386>empty<s%> <S%H7641>heads<s%> of grain <S%H7710>blasted<s%> with the east <S%H6921>wind;<s%> they will be <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> of <S%H7458>famine.<s%>
That is the <S%H1697>thing<s%> which I <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh.<s%> What <S%H430>God<s%> is about to <S%H6213>do<s%> he has <S%H7200>shown<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh.<s%>
<S%H935>Behold,<s%> there come <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> of <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7647>plenty<s%> throughout all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

There will <S%H6965>arise<s%> after <S%H310>them<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> of <S%H7458>famine,<s%> and all the <S%H7647>plenty<s%> will be <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%> The <S%H7458>famine<s%> will <S%H3615>consume<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%>

and the <S%H7647>plenty<s%> will not be <S%H3045>known<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> by <S%H6440>reason<s%> of that <S%H7458>famine<s%> which <S%H310>follows;<s%> for it will be <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3515>grievous.<s%>

The <S%H2472>dream<s%> was <S%H8138>doubled<s%> <S%H6471>to<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> because the <S%H1697>thing<s%> is <S%H3559>established<s%> <S%H5973>by<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H4116>shortly<s%> bring it to <S%H6213>pass.<s%>
"Now therefore let <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> look <S%H7200>for<s%> a <S%H995>discreet<s%> and <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> and <S%H7896>set<s%> him over the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

Let <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H6485>this,<s%> and let him appoint overseers over the <S%H776>land,<s%> and take up the fifth <S%H2567>part<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>'s produce in the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7647>plenteous<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>

Let them <S%H6908>gather<s%> all the <S%H400>food<s%> of these <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> that <S%H935>come,<s%> and lay <S%H6651>up<s%> <S%H1250>grain<s%> under the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> for <S%H400>food<s%> in the <S%H5892>cities,<s%> and let them keep <S%H8104>it.<s%>

The <S%H400>food<s%> will be for a <S%H6487>store<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> against the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> of <S%H7458>famine,<s%> which will be in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> that the <S%H776>land<s%> not <S%H3772>perish<s%> through the <S%H7458>famine.<s%>"
The <S%H1697>thing<s%> was <S%H3190>good<s%> in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of all his <S%H5650>servants.<s%>

<S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> "Can we <S%H4672>find<s%> such a one as <S%H2088>this,<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> in <S%H834>whom<s%> is the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of <S%H430>God?<s%>"

<S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> <S%H310>"Because<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H3045>shown<s%> you all of <S%H995>this,<s%> there is none so discreet and wise as <S%H2450>you.<s%>

You shall <S%H1961>be<s%> over my <S%H1004>house,<s%> and according to your <S%H6310>word<s%> will all my <S%H5971>people<s%> be <S%H5401>ruled.<s%> Only in the <S%H3678>throne<s%> I will be greater than <S%H1431>you.<s%>"
<S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> <S%H7200>"Behold,<s%> I have <S%H5414>set<s%> you over all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>"

<S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> took <S%H5493>off<s%> his signet <S%H2885>ring<s%> from his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> it on <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>'s <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H6440>arrayed<s%> him in <S%H899>robes<s%> of fine <S%H8336>linen,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> a <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H7242>chain<s%> about his <S%H6677>neck,<s%>

and he made him to <S%H7392>ride<s%> in the <S%H4932>second<s%> <S%H4818>chariot<s%> which he <S%H7121>had.<s%> They cried before <S%H6440>him,<s%> "Bow the <S%H86>knee!<s%>" He set <S%H6440>him<s%> over all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

<S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> "I am <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and <S%H1107>without<s%> you shall no <S%H376>man<s%> lift <S%H7311>up<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> or his <S%H7272>foot<s%> in all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>"

<S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>'s <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H6847>Zaphenath-Paneah;<s%> and he <S%H5414>gave<s%> him <S%H621>Asenath,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6319>Potiphera<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%> of <S%H204>On<s%> as a <S%H802>wife.<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> over the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

<S%H3130>Joseph<s%> was <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> from the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and went <S%H5674>throughout<s%> all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>
In the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7647>plenteous<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H6213>produced<s%> <S%H7062>abundantly.<s%>

He gathered <S%H6908>up<s%> all the <S%H400>food<s%> of the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> which were in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and laid <S%H5414>up<s%> the <S%H400>food<s%> in the <S%H5892>cities:<s%> the <S%H400>food<s%> of the <S%H7704>field,<s%> which was <S%H5439>around<s%> every <S%H5892>city,<s%> he laid <S%H5414>up<s%> in the <S%H8432>same.<s%>

<S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H6651>laid<s%> up <S%H1250>grain<s%> as the <S%H2344>sand<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7235>much,<s%> until he <S%H2308>stopped<s%> <S%H5608>counting,<s%> for it was <S%H369>without<s%> <S%H4557>number.<s%>

To <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> were <S%H3205>born<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> before the <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H7458>famine<s%> <S%H935>came,<s%> whom <S%H621>Asenath,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6319>Potiphera<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%> of <S%H204>On,<s%> bore to <S%H3205>him.<s%>

<S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> <S%H430>"For,<s%>" he said, "God has made me <S%H5382>forget<s%> all my <S%H5999>toil,<s%> and all my <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>house.<s%>"

The <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H8145>second,<s%> he <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim:<s%> "For <S%H430>God<s%> has made me <S%H6509>fruitful<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of my <S%H6040>affliction.<s%>"
The <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> of <S%H7647>plenty,<s%> that were in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> came to an <S%H3615>end.<s%>

The <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> of <S%H7458>famine<s%> <S%H2490>began<s%> to <S%H935>come,<s%> just as <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> had <S%H559>said.<s%> There was <S%H7458>famine<s%> in all <S%H776>lands,<s%> but in all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> there was <S%H3899>bread.<s%>

When all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> was <S%H7456>famished,<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H6817>cried<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> for <S%H3899>bread,<s%> and <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to all the <S%H4714>Egyptians,<s%> <S%H3212>"Go<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph.<s%> What he <S%H559>says<s%> to <S%H6213>you,<s%> do."

The <S%H7458>famine<s%> was over all the <S%H6440>surface<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H6605>opened<s%> all the store <S%H7666>houses,<s%> and sold to the <S%H4714>Egyptians.<s%> The <S%H7458>famine<s%> was <S%H2388>severe<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

All <S%H776>countries<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> to <S%H7666>buy<s%> <S%H7458>grain,<s%> because the famine was <S%H2388>severe<s%> in all the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
